description.english: Complete all Langya Sword Pavillion events.
description.schinese: 完成琅琊剑阁相关事件。
description.tchinese: 完成琅琊劍閣相關事件。

description.english: Complete all Blue Wind Camp events.
Complete all Nest of Swallow events.
Complete all Crime Investigation Bureau events.
Reach max level of any Resource skill.
description.schinese: 任一项采集类能力达到登峰造极。
description.tchinese: 任一項採集類能力達到登峰造極。

description.english: Reach max level of any Craft skill.
description.schinese: 任一项制造类能力达到登峰造极。
description.tchinese: 任一項製造類能力達到登峰造極。

description.english: Reach max level of any Appraise skill.
description.schinese: 任一项鉴定类能力达到登峰造极。
description.tchinese: 任一項鑑定類能力達到登峰造極。

description.english: Reach max level of any Survival skill.
description.schinese: 任一项生存类能力达到登峰造极。
description.tchinese: 任一項生存類能力達到登峰造極。

description.english: Reach max level of any Rogue skill.
description.schinese: 任一项市井类能力达到登峰造极。
description.tchinese: 任一項市井類能力達到登峰造極。

description.english: Recruit all Nameless Village characters (Hunter, Informant, Blacksmith, Doctor, Innkeeper).
description.schinese: 无名小村猎户、包打听、铁匠、郎中、老板娘同时入队。
description.tchinese: 無名小村獵戶、包打聽、鐵匠、郎中、老闆娘同時入隊。

description.english: At the start of the game, defeat Nest of Swallow's reinforcement force.
description.schinese: 开局在野外击败燕子窝的援军。
description.tchinese: 開局在野外擊敗燕子窩的援軍。

description.english: Destroy Blue Wind Camp in an official way.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭青风寨。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅青風寨。

description.english: Destroy Nest of Swallow in an official way.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭燕子窝。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅燕子窩。

description.english: Destroy Crime Investigation Bureau in an official way.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭神捕门。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅神捕門。

description.english: Destroy Langya Sword Pavillion in an official way.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭琅琊剑阁。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅琅琊劍閣。

description.english: Destroy Taoist Sect in an official way.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭道玄宗。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅道玄宗。

description.english: Form a bond with a female companion for the first time.
Win all money from the dealer for the first time.
description.schinese: 玩骰子首次赢光庄家大部分钱财。
description.tchinese: 玩骰子首次贏光莊家大部分錢財。

description.english: Win all money from the dealer 20 times in total.
description.schinese: 玩骰子使庄家封盘，累计20次。
description.tchinese: 玩骰子使莊家封盤，累計20次。

description.schinese: 在“龙舟论粽大赛”中胜出。
description.tchinese: 在“龍舟論粽大賽”中勝出。

description.english: Storm into Yan Army Camp and annihilate all enemies.
description.schinese: 前往燕国行辕大营选择直接剿灭燕云铁军。
description.tchinese: 前往燕國行轅大營選擇直接剿滅燕雲鐵軍。

description.english: Receive an official title and reward after Kang Wang ascends the throne.
description.schinese: 康王登基后，获得其封赏。
description.tchinese: 康王登基後，獲得其封賞。

description.english: Win the titles Provincial Top Examiner, Country Top Examiner and Top Achiever.
description.schinese: 获得解元、会元、状元身份。
description.tchinese: 獲得解元、會元、狀元身份。

description.english: Destroy Shifa Temple in an official way.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭释法寺。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅釋法寺。

description.schinese: 消灭燕云铁军势力中所有重要人物。
description.tchinese: 消滅燕雲鐵軍勢力中所有重要人物。

description.english: Destroy Confucius Temple in an official way.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭儒圣馆。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅儒聖館。

description.english: Achieve True Ending in Freedom Mode 300.
description.schinese: 自由难度下难度系数达到300 达成真结局。
description.tchinese: 自由難度下難度係數達到300 達成真結局。

description.english: Achieve True Ending in Freedom Mode 600.
description.schinese: 自由难度下难度系数达到600 达成真结局。
description.tchinese: 自由難度下難度係數達到600 達成真結局。

description.english: Achieve True Ending in Freedom Mode 900.
description.schinese: 自由难度下难度系数达到900 达成真结局。
description.tchinese: 自由難度下難度係數達到900 達成真結局。

description.english: Achieve True Ending in Freedom Mode 1200.
description.schinese: 自由难度下难度系数达到1200 达成真结局。
description.tchinese: 自由難度下難度係數達到1200 達成真結局。

description.english: Choose the "Unify the Jianghu" ambition,Eventually become the Jianghu Master or Jianghu Conqueror
description.schinese: 无名小村拜师后，最终成为武林盟主或武林霸主。
description.tchinese: 無名小村拜師後，最終成為武林盟主或武林霸主。

description.english: Choose the "Protect The Country" ambition,Trigger "Duty to the Nation" ending.
description.schinese: 无名小村拜师后，触发“尽忠报国”结局。
description.tchinese: 無名小村拜師後，觸發“盡忠報國”結局。

description.english: Choose the "Peak of Jianghu" ambition,Trigger "Peak of Jianghu" ending.
description.schinese: 无名小村拜师后，触发“天下第一”结局。
description.tchinese: 無名小村拜師後，觸發“天下第一”結局。

description.english: Consume 20 or more Epic or above rarity foods.
description.schinese: 食用20个乙品以上的食物。
description.tchinese: 食用20個乙品以上的食物。

description.english: Consume 20 or more Epic or above rarity poisons.
description.schinese: 食用20个乙品以上的毒物。
description.tchinese: 食用20個乙品以上的毒物。

description.english: Consume 20 or more Epic or above rarity wines.
Establish relationships with 100 NPCs, all reaching a level of 100.
Encounter the special Easter egg scene for the first time in the game.
description.schinese: 首次进入游戏内的彩蛋场景。
description.tchinese: 首次進入遊戲內的彩蛋場景。

description.english: Form a bond with Hua Siniang
Form a bond with Luo Qianxue.
Form a bond with Hua Qingqing.
Form a bond with Ye Yinpeng.
Form a bond with Jiang Ziyan.
Form a bond with Princess Fuqing.
Form a bond with Man Tuoluo.
Form a bond with Qu Wangyou.
Form a bond with Han Hongyu.
Form a bond with Gu Qingcheng.
Form a bond with Ya Qin.
Form a bond with Miao Caidie.
Form a bond with Ling Mengdie.
Form a bond with Yan Rurui.
Form a bond with Yu Weier.
Form a bond with Wanyan Zhaoning.
Form a bond with Fu Yaoqin.
Establish a deep bond with Tang Wan'er.
Righteously exterminate the Jiuli Tribe through open and honorable means.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭九黎部落。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅九黎部落。

description.english: Righteously exterminate the Melody House through open and honorable means.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭妙音坊。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅妙音坊。

description.english: Righteously exterminate the Beasts Manor through open and honorable means.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭万兽山庄。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅萬獸山莊。

displayName.english: Annihilation of the Jiujiang Water Camp

description.english: Righteously exterminate the Jiujiang Water Camp through open and honorable means.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭九江水寨
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅九江水寨

description.english: Become a member of the Jiujiang Water Camp.
Reach the true ending with a difficulty level of 2000 on the Custom difficulty mode.
description.schinese: 自由难度下难度系数达到2000 达成真结局。
description.tchinese: 自由難度下難度係數達到2000 達成真結局。

description.english: Reach a high score of 200 in the Tower of Trials.
Reach a high score of 500 in the Tower of Trials.
Reach a high score of 800 in the Tower of Trials.
Reach a high score of 1200 in the Tower of Trials.
Eliminate the Cold Skin Gang in a fair and honorable manner.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭冷皮帮。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅冷皮幫。

description.english: Eliminate the Divine Flame Sect in a fair and honorable manner.
description.schinese: 光明正大的方式剿灭圣火宗。
description.tchinese: 光明正大的方式剿滅聖火宗。

description.english: Form a bond with Feng Xuanji
Form a bond with Haitang Qiu.
Form a bond with Tsukuyo Sakuraha.
Gather evidence against King Chai and have him convicted and imprisoned.
description.schinese: 抓住柴王的把柄，将柴王定罪入狱。
description.tchinese: 抓住柴王的把柄，將柴王定罪入獄。
